item.title: The Left Hand of Darkness
item.description: Imperfect and still utterly perfect. Favorite always. The David Mitchell foreword Picture if you will reading this book when it was published, 1969, the year of Stonewall

item.title: The Will to Battle
item.description: Reader, I cried like Mycroft Canner. Itâ€™s very much the first half of a whole (third quarter of four?), and it needs [[books/perhaps the stars|the last book]] to be complete, but what a feat it is on its own.

item.title: Underland
item.description: For to think in deep time can be a means not of escaping our troubled present, but rather of re-imagining it; countermanding its quick greeds and furies with older, slower stories of making and unmaking.
